cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Wun Su, Guru of the Staff deals combat to a player, you may create Wun Su's Staff, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +5/+5” and equip {5}, then attach it to Wun Su.

Alpha (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.)
When Xiejuan, the Regal Beast becomes alpha, draw a card for each other creature you control.

[0]: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Xiong Mao, Survivalist deals damage to any target equal to that creature's power, then put a number of loyalty counters on Xiong Mao equal to that creature's toughness.
[-2]: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control dies, you may draw cards equal to its power, then you may gain life equal to its toughness.”

Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Ferocious — Whenever enchanted creature attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, enchanted creature gains double strike until end of turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{R}{R}. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste. Exile that token at end of combat.
Ferocious — Whenever Xiusheng of the Dragon Realm attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Xiusheng gains double strike until end of turn.

Flying
Whenever Yawning Crane deals combat damage to an opponent, target tapped creature that player controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Young Dragonheart gets +1/+0 and has first strike as long as you control a legendary creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The fire may burn my robes to cinders, but it only serves to ignite my soul.”
[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Other creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
• Other creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Lifelink
When Zhehan, the Mediator enters, you may put an Aura card with mana value 3 or less from your hand onto the battlefield attached to a creature it could enchant.
